text: ( CNN ) Amelia Gray Hamlin, the daughter of actors Lisa Rinna and Harry Hamlin, took to Instagram on Sunday to reveal that she struggled with anorexia. The 16 - year - old model posted two photos of herself wearing swimsuits. Hamlin explained in the caption that the first photo is recent, while the other is from last year when she was suffering from anorexia. Hamlin looked visibly thinner in the second photo. ` ` Last year at this time there was no doubt that I was not okay,'' Hamlin wrote in the captiom. ` ` Not only physically but also mentally.
